attributes.action: alow choice for children in secondary to drop R.E(religious education)
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: to alow children in year 9(age 14) in their choices to be able to drop religios education only if they were able to pass a test on general religion and subjects coverd in R.E. This would mean if someone was not able to pass the test would be forced to take it for GCSE because they would not have a great enough understanding of it.
